required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study on the Bioequivalence of Perindopril Tert-butylamine Tablets Taken on After Meals in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Bioequivalence Study of Oral Perindopril Tert-butylamine Tablets After Meal in Healthy Subjects With a Single-dose, Randomized, Open-lable, Four-cycle, Crossover Trial Design

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: In order to evaluate the bioequivalence of the test preparation and reference preparation of perindopril tert-butylamine tablets after meal and their safety in Chinese adult healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: This single-center, randomized, open, single-dose, four-cycle，cross-over design bioequivalence test was conducted in subjects after meal conditions. Subjects were fasted for at least 10 hours over the night in each cycle，but can't ban their from drinking water.The next morning，after eating a high-fat and high-calorie meal for 30 minutes, according to test-reference (TR) or Reference-test (RT) sequential oral perindopril tert-butylamine tablets (4 mg, 240 mL warm water). Each period was separated with a 14-day wash-out period in after meal trials. The blood concentrations of perindopril and perindoprilat in qualified subjects were tested. Safety assessment includes vital signs examination, physical examination, laboratory safety examination, coagulation examination, electrocardiogram and adverse event reports.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration (within 2 hours) and 10 minutes to 72 hours after administration

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve （AUC0-∞、AUC0-t）of Perindopril
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration (within 2 hours) and 10 minutes to 72 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum plasma concentration(Tmax) of Perindopril and Perindoprilat
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration (within 2 hours) and 10 minutes to 72 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal elimination half-life（t1/2 ）of Perindopril and Perindoprilat
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration (within 2 hours) and 10 minutes to 72 hours after administration
Before administration (within 2 hours) and 10 minutes to 72 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve （AUC0-∞、AUC0-t）of Perindoprilat
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration (within 2 hours) and 10 minutes to 72 hours after administration

other_outcome.time_frame: from the screening to 46 days post-dose
other_outcome.description: Adverse events are summarized according to the system organ classification and standard name, and the system organ classification and standard name are arranged in descending order of the frequency of the tested preparation group

arm_group.arm_group_label: Perindopril tert-Butylamine tablets （ Produced by Haisco）
arm_group.description: The trial was divided into four cycles, between of each cycle with a 14-day wash-out period.In the first cycle，subjects in experimental group took the test preparation Perindopril tert-butylamine after meal, and subjects in control group took the reference preparation ACERTIL® after meal; In the second cycle subjects in experimental group took the reference preparation ACERTIL® after meal , the trial preparation perindopril tert-butylamine was taken orally after meals for the subjects in control group ; the order of taking the medicines for the subjects in the third cycle was the same as that in the first cycle, and the taking order of the subjects in the fourth cycle was the same as that in the second cycle. A single oral administration was used for the four cycles, and the dose was 4 mg.

The trial was divided into four cycles, between of each cycle with a 14-day wash-out period.In the first cycle，subjects in experimental group took the test preparation Perindopril tert-butylamine after meal, and subjects in control group took the reference preparation ACERTIL® after meal; In the second cycle subjects in experimental group took the reference preparation ACERTIL® after meal , the trial preparation perindopril tert-butylamine was taken orally after meals for the subjects in control group ; the order of taking the medicines for the subjects in the third cycle was the same as that in the first cycle, and the taking order of the subjects in the fourth cycle was the same as that in the second cycle. A single oral administration was used for the four cycles, and the dose was 4 mg.

facility.name: General Hospital of the northern theater of the Chinese people's Liberation Army
